Title: IMPI projects 17% inflation rate by December, urges CBN to cut benchmark rate
Summary: The Independent Media and Policy Initiative (IMPI) has projected that Nigeria’s headline inflation will drop further to 17 per cent by December 2025, following consecutive declines that reduced the figure to 20.12 per cent in August . The policy think tank urges the CBN to cut benchmark rate .

Title: Oyo traffic agency busts impersonators exploiting motorists in Ibadan
Summary: The Oyo State Road Traffic Management Authority (OYRTMA) has apprehended eight individuals impersonating traffic officers and extorting motorists in Ibadan . The arrest was made during a routine operation aimed at curbing illegal activities .

Title: CAN urges regulation of church-run maternity homes in Cross River
Summary: CAN urges regulation of church-run maternity homes in Cross River . The Christian Association of Nigeria has called on the Cross River State Government to enact legislation regulating maternity homes operated by churches and traditional birth attendants . CAN: Unmonitored practices endangering the lives of mothers and children .

Title: Man Utd post sixth straight annual loss despite record revenues
Summary: Manchester United post sixth straight annual loss despite record revenues . Manchester United reported annual net loss for sixth consecutive year . Man Utd reported record revenues of £666.5 million ($910 million)

Title: King gives Trump royal welcome on UK state visit
Summary: Donald Trump was welcomed by King Charles III to Windsor Castle Wednesday . The US president’s historic second state visit got into full swing . Gun salutes, mounted horses and bagpipes were part of a royal spectacle .

Title: Fubara Returns: 60 key moments that led to Emergency Rule in Rivers
Summary: Governor Siminalayi Fubara of Rivers State is set to return to office following the suspension of the six-month State of Emergency imposed on the state by President Bola Tinubu .

Title: Scientists train AI model to predict future illnesses
Summary: Based on a patient's case history, the Delphi-2M AI "predicts the rates of more than 1,000 diseases" years into the future .

Title: Lagos Fire: FIRS loses 4 senior staff, mourns departed
Summary: The Federal Inland Revenue Service, FIRS, has plunged into mourning following the death of four of its senior staff members in the fire incident that gutted Afriland Towers on Broad Street, Lagos, on Tuesday .

Title: Group urges Ibas to ensure smooth handover to Fubara
Summary: Group urges Sole Administrator of Rivers State, Vice Admiral Ikot-Ete Ibas (rtd) to ensure smooth handover of power to Governor Siminalayi Fubara . The Rivers Peace Initiative (RPI) has called on Ibas to ensure a transparent and seamless handover .

Title: It would have been colossal failure not to declare state of emergency in Rivers — Tinubu
Summary: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu justified his decision to declare a state of emergency in Rivers State six months ago . Failure to act at the time would have amounted to a “colossal failure” on his part as President .
